name: Box Brick Play Fun
description:
Box Brick Play Fun is the classical and legendary game. I'm sure with you that you had played at least one time when you were child.This is because it is easy to understand, multi-level play from easy to hard to make players never feel bored or frustrated because it is impossible to pass a table. The goal of the game is to drop blocks into empty positions to fill up the fastest rows to clear them from the board, preventing the blocks from filling the screen.
How to play:
Navigate and place the falling blocks to the empty spaces to form a line which will break. It is possible to form and break more than one line :)
